title: Zimbabweans abroad dismiss Ziyambi’s claim that diaspora voting depends on constitutional amendment
desc: The Zimbabwe Diaspora Vote Initiative (ZDVI) has dismissed claims by Justice Minister Ziyambi Ziyambi that Zimbabweans living abroad will only be able to vote after the passage of the Constitutional Amendment Bill No. 3 of 2026, saying the two issues are unrelated.
